OOC: Is Pumpskin attacking Fury and Riekan or Blackfang and Katya?

Ragnar's situation was deteriorating. Another poisoned blast hit him 
and an explosion twisted his fright foot backward. But he was too 
groggy to feel it.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> OOC: They're firing the same weapons as always - explosive harpoons 
> and cybervenom blasts.
> 
> The surprised Rogues take to the air to avoid the sudden barrage of 
> counterfire.  Riekan's harpoon gun and Fury's cybervenom dart-
> launcher speak in reply.  Looking at Pumpskin, Fury shakes his 
> head.  "I thought that joker was on our side!"
> 
> Answering the charge, Pumpskin suddenly strikes out at his 
> two "allies", seeking once again to ensnare them with his tentacles 
> (two tendrils each), this time with the appendages seeping caustic 
> fluids.  "He is!" the crazed warrior chortles.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Windlord:
> > 
> > "Ok"replied the male "I'll cover you.."
> > 
> > He fired against the enemie
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> > > 
> > > : : Kup : :
> > > 
> > > Kup continued to drag Ragnar out.
> > > 
> > > Kup: Help me get this guy to safety. We cant lose anyone.
